SELECT 'MR' || trim(nvl(max(to_char(to_number(substr(mrno,3))+1,'000000')),'000001')) as mrno from menualreply
union
select nvl(null,'BR000001') as mrno from dual where not exists (select mrno from menualreply)
select mrno as rno ,content as replyText ,regDate ,updateDate ,manualno as refNo ,eno from menualreply where manualno=#{refNo} order by mrno asc
select count(manualno) from menualreply where manualno=#{refNo}
select b.name from menualreply a, employee b where a.eno = b.eno and a.mrno = #{rno}
select b.photo from menualreply a, employee b where a.eno = b.eno and a.mrno = #{rno}
